extendedInfo.description: TO USE:Long Press On Desktop => Wallpapers => Live WallpapersThis demo version is intended to be used to decide if you would like to purchase the paid version. It is fully-functional with all features unlocked, the only difference from the paid version is that a "Demo Version" reminder text appears every five minutes (there's also a link to purchase the full version from the launcher)."Lonely Tree" is an Android live wallpaper designed with the Nexus 10 in mind, with high-resolution textures and a tablet-friendly holo-themed settings panel. It looks and feels beautiful on standard sized phones as well.The winter nature scene reacts dynamically to the wind speed range selected in the settings, with the tree gently swaying in the wind, the bushes fluttering, and the snowflakes becoming faster and more streaky.Almost everything is customizable including the strength of the wind, the amount of snow, and the size and position of the tree. You can optionally add Christmas lights to the tree, and change it to night-time to really see them glow."Easy on the phoneâs memory and is just soothing to watch"www.droid-life.com"Grab a cup of hot chocolate, sit back and enjoy a beautiful winter scene"www.DroidApps.org"Itâs a simple, somber winter scene thatâs fully customizable and very beautiful"www.android-apps.comSome features I plan to add over the next few months:* Secondary trees in background* Brightness/Contrast settings* More complex cloud layers* Snowflakes in the snowdrifts* More natural tree branch movements (independent of each other)* Wind gusts* Optional fence in front of the tree* Birds (or other animals) flying in the backgroundAnd over the next year:* Other seasons (Spring, Summer, Fall)* Different weather types (sun, fog, etc...)

reviews.title: Most Realistic Live Wallpaper on the store
reviews.comment: except the flaw that the bushes are not waiving from air rather they are shaking from left to right and that too with a very high speed, which actually ruins the whole scene and makes the wallpaper unrealistic, other than that it\'s the most realistic live wallpaper, not to mention the best
reviews.author: Sam Note

reviews.title: The best
reviews.comment: I turn on my phone and just sit there looking at the wallpaper. Its so cool and natural especially the summer scene. The night/day cycle is one of a kind. But it would be cool if there was moon and stars during night. And during day: sunshine (summer). overall the wallpaper is very good, one of my favorite. Or maybe it is my favorite... Hmmm...
reviews.author: Dima Odoviychuk

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Cool and neat Wow! Soooooooooo cool! Soooooooooo Wow! Soooooooooo neat! Soooooooooo Fab! Soooooooooo Sweet! Soooooooooo love! Soooooooooo TY TY!
reviews.author: ROBIN STAGE

reviews.title: Awesome. But could have more features
reviews.comment: Looking good so far! The special effects looks and feels more natural than any other weather effect LWP! I like how it auto-detects night/day cycle. But could it detect weather cycle as well, and displaying temperature on the bottom right or something? That would be cool. I am also looking forward in seeing some birds in the future and stuff for it to make it more lively.
reviews.author: Matoro Zeliph
